alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Loudon; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Monroe; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:25PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Loudon, Blount, northeastern Monroe and southern Sevier Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pigeon Forge to 10 miles southeast of Eagleton Village to 11 miles southwest of Maryville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Alcoa, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Eagleton Village, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain and Vonore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for east Tennessee. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for east Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Loudon; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Monroe; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe
